The eight factors of the observance of t: Giving up killing living creatures, renouncing the rod and the sword
Being scrupulous and kind, and living full of compassion for all living beings
Giving up high and luxurious beds and sleeping in a low place, either a small bed or a straw mat
Observing the sabbath by doing as the perfected ones do in this respect
The comparison of human kingship and the: Fifty years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods of the Four Great Kings
A hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods of the Thirty-Three
Two hundred years in the human realm…
Four hundred years in the human realm…
Eight hundred years in the human realm…
Sixteen hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
The ethical practices for observing the: Not wearing garlands or applying perfumes
Sleeping on a low bed or a mat on the ground
